# Git Setup Commands for VibeCode Project

# 1. Initialize Git repository
cd "C:\Users\2013041\VibeCode"
git init

# 2. Configure Git (replace with your details)
git config user.name "Your Name"
git config user.email "your.email@example.com"

# 3. Create .gitignore file
echo "# Python
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
*.so
.Python
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# Virtual Environment
.venv/
venv/
ENV/

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite3

# Logs
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# Project specific
aim_processor.log
exports/*.json" > .gitignore

# 4. Add all files
git add .

# 5. Initial commit
git commit -m "Initial commit: AIM Project with enhanced bulk upload and field mapping features"

# 6. Add remote repository (replace with your GitHub repo URL)
git remote add origin https://github.com/yourusername/your-repo-name.git

# 7. Push to GitHub
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
